subject: Thanks for your recent application, we are ready to lend some cash
body:
Your credit does not matter to us!
 
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE cash to spend ANY way you like, or simply want to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is our deal we can offer you TODAY (hurry, this lot will expire TODAY):
 
$352,000+ loan
 
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest current payments!
 
Hurry, when our best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply complete this user-friendly form... 
 
Do not worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
 
http://whoodiasir.com/
